title: Information page preferences

fields.instructions: IMPORTANT Make sure the logo and hover logo are the exact same size!

sub_fields.label: Secondary language title
sub_fields.name: secLangTitle
sub_fields.instructions:
Title for secondary language of the site
</br>
If left empty, the primary language will always show.

fields.label: Content
fields.name: acfAboutFlexContent
fields.instructions:
Flexible content for the about page.
Create the required elements.

sub_fields.label: Mobile image
sub_fields.name: MobileImageCheck
sub_fields.instructions: Check if another image is going to be displayed for mobile devices.

sub_fields.label: Opacity
sub_fields.name: opacity
sub_fields.instructions:
Set tint opacity.
Default opacity is 50% (0.5).

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: Blog post's that are set to be shown at index will show up in section when this is set.

title: home information

fields.label: message
fields.message:
This page is only a dummy page to enable us to use both front-page.php AND home.php connected to a custom page (knowledge hub).

So this page does nothing accept enable us to use a static front page.

description: For the page set as WP home

title: Blog post

fields.label: Show on index
fields.name: acfKnowHubPostCaseShow
fields.instructions:
If selected, the post will be shown on index.
Only the five newest post's choosen will be shown.
